items.title: Watershed Restoration Labs
items.description: Community-led crews stabilize riverbanks, replant native species, and monitor water health with open sensors.

items.title: Regenerative Farmer Network
items.description: We train farmers on soil-first practices, microbial health, and carbon-smart cropping with peer mentorship.

items.title: Resilience Research Grants
items.description: We fund Indigenous-led experiments on drought-resilient crops, agroforestry, and watershed rehydration.
